description: Last season's Champion takes on feisty Mika Tan. Mika hates losing and never gives up. Her pride prevents her from submitting. The Dragon, however, cares nothing for pride and gives Mika a sound thrashing and a good fucking. Give credit to Mika because she only gave up 159 points. However, she never had a chance. You'll find some great head scissors and leg scissors in this update.
title: The Dragon (2-0) vs. The Samoan (0-1)
